descript.abstract: Wisconsin Tax Pacels, 2017 is a polygon theme representing tax parcels and lots in various Wisconsin counties from the year 2015-2017. The counties included are Adams, Ashland, Barron, Bayfield, Brown, Buffalo, Burnett, Calumet, Chippewa, Clark, Columbia, Crawford, Dane, Dodge, Door, Douglas, Dunn, Eau Claire, Florence, Fond Du Lac, Forest, Grant, Green, Green Lake, Iowa, Iron, Jackson, Jefferson, Juneau, Kenosha, Kewaunee, La Crosse, Lafayette, Langlade, Lincoln, Manitowoc, Marathon, Marinette, Marquette, Menominee, Milwaukee, Monroe, Oconto, Oneida, Outagamie, Ozaukee, Pepin, Pierce, Polk, Portage, Price, Racine, Richland, Rock, Rusk, St. Croix, Sauk, Sawyer, Shawano, Sheboygan, Taylor, Trempealeau, Vernon, Vilas, Walworth, Washburn, Washington, Waukesha, Waupaca, Waushara, Winnebago, Wood. Attribute information typically includes details regarding the address, ownership and valuation of the lot as well as information regarding structures on the parcel. Accompaning layers will usually include street centerlines and county boundy layers. Additional cadastral and property files are included, though the content and format of these additional files may vary. All files were collected and published by Boundary Solutions as part of the National ParcelMap Data Portal.
descript.purpose: These files are formatted for use in a GIS

metainfo.metstdn: FGDC Content Standards for Digital Geospatial Metadata

cntperp.cntorg: Research Data Sercvices (RDS), Columbia University Libraries.
